name: Chili Cheese Dip
author: Christine Estes

ingredients.name: can Hormel Chili with no beans
(8 oz.) pkg. shredded Monterey Jack and Colby cheese

instructions: Spread cream cheese over bottom of 8 x 13 glass pan. Spread chili over cream cheese. Add green chilies (optional). Top with cheese and sliced jalapeno peppers (optional). Bake at 325Â° until bubbly. Let sit for 5 minutes before serving.
